channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: The Mother Flip
channel.desc: Rebecca, Kristy, and Roy have found their next potential flip: a lakefront property with a spicy past. Weather-beaten and dated, this former vacation home is definitely lackluster. The 180-foot dock and attached deck need repairs, and both the kitchen and primary bath are gut jobs. But the team makes smart choices to turn this lusty lakehouse into a luxurious family retreat.
